meanings.sent2: Loud noises tend to discombobulate my thoughts.
meanings.sent3: Trying to solve a Rubik's cube always discombobulates me.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist in the movie discombobulated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The magician's sleight of hand trick discombobulated the entire crowd.

meanings.sent1: His constant interruptions discombobulate the meeting.
meanings.sent2: Technical issues always discombobulate the live broadcast.
meanings.sent3: Running out of coffee in the morning really discombobulates me.
meanings.sent4: The sudden change in plans discombobulated her carefully laid out schedule.
meanings.sent5: The malfunctioning alarm clock discombobulated his morning routine.
